name: Two Tanks (Key147)
description:
This is my first game jam and I am happy with my game considering I learnt how to code pong two days prior to the jam. If you want to see everything try to win after the 20 second mark. I was gonna make the missile make an explosion noise when it explodes mid air, but when I added that I had to delay the queue free to after the sound (about half a second) for it to work which made it unfair. If you have a solution please tell me.

Controls:

Movement - W/A/S/D

Aim with mouse and left click to fire
